description: '''Cassius''' was a French musical duo active from 1988 to 2019 and consisting of [[Record producer|producers]] Philippe Cerboneschi and Hubert Blanc-Francard, better known as '''Zdar''' and '''Boombass''' (or sometimes '''Philippe Zdar''' and '''Hubert Boombass'''). Under its different incarnations the duo is likened to the "[[French house|French touch]]" movement of electronic music in the second half of the 1990s.
